attributes.action: UK Government to put Diplomatic Pressure on Countries such as China and the United States for the Abolition of the Death Penalty
attributes.additional_details: The Government in the United Kingdom are at present in support of the abolition of the death penalty. This Petition reinforces that although the death penalty has been abolished in the UK entirely since 1998, countries still utilizing this form of punishment should be put under diplomatic pressure to abolish the death penalty.
